original_title: A Couple of White Chicks at the Hairdresser
overview: "A COUPLE OF WHITE CHICKS AT THE HAIRDRESSER" is a Dramady about two very different women who develop an unexpected friendship that is sometimes poignant, sometimes hilarious. And always very real. In the pathos of their competition they find their adversary becomes their best friend.
title: A Couple of White Chicks at the Hairdresser
